name: ARSkeleton.JointName
desc: A name identifier for a joint.

items.name: init?(VNRecognizedPointKey)
items.desc: Returns a joint name that corresponds to a key point defined in a human body pose.

items.name: struct VNRecognizedPointKey
items.desc: The data type for all recognized point keys.

items.name: static let root: ARSkeleton.JointName
items.desc: A skeletal joint that's the root of all other joints.

items.name: static let head: ARSkeleton.JointName
items.desc: A skeletal joint that ARKit tracks representing the head.

items.name: static let leftFoot: ARSkeleton.JointName
items.desc: A skeletal joint that ARKit tracks representing the left foot.

items.name: static let leftHand: ARSkeleton.JointName
items.desc: A skeletal joint that ARKit tracks representing the left hand.

items.name: static let leftShoulder: ARSkeleton.JointName
items.desc: A skeletal joint that ARKit tracks representing the left shoulder.

items.name: static let rightFoot: ARSkeleton.JointName
items.desc: A skeletal joint that ARKit tracks representing the right foot.

items.name: static let rightHand: ARSkeleton.JointName
items.desc: A skeletal joint that ARKit tracks representing the right hand.

items.name: static let rightShoulder: ARSkeleton.JointName
items.desc: A skeletal joint that ARKit tracks representing the right shoulder.
